text: CC, for "CopyCat" or "Carbon Copy"Science Magazine Report (December 22, 2001 â€“ March 3, 2020), was a brown tabby and white domestic shorthair and the first cloned pet. She was cloned by scientists at Texas A&M; University. In 2004, Genetic Savings and Clone would go on to produce the first commercially cloned pet, a Maine Coon cat named "Little Nicky" who was cloned from a 17 year old deceased pet cat. On March 3, 2020, CC died at 18 years in College Station, Texas. ==References== Category:Individual cats Category:2001 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cloned animals
title: CC (cat)
